originalText.text:
I have been going to Roman K Salon (Madison Ave) for a couple of years now. The staff is very friendly, warm, and always cooperative. The atmosphere at the salon is peaceful and quite serene. They give the highest importance to maintaining hygiene standards.
I would like to express my special thanks to Bella Sky who has been doing my hair for many years now. She is very compassionate and has always understood both my desires and concerns about coloring my hair.
As a perfectionist myself, I strongly recommend Bella to everyone who wants to get their hair done perfectly and professionally. She is an expert in coloring and hairdressing and knows the latest trends in the industry. Like I‚Äôve mentioned earlier, I have been going to Bella for many years and there is always consistency in her work. She‚Äôs a great communicator, very patient and is willing to answer all your possible questions ‚Äì whether it‚Äôs understanding different styles, hair textures, or colors.
Over all, my experience with Bella at Roman K salon is always 10/10.

originalText.text: Today I visited Roman K Salon . I was very worried about my hair but in the end I‚Äôm very happy!!! Masha Ianiuk who is working there as a hair stylist advised me an air touch technique. She said that this technique is done with a hairdryer and doesn‚Äôt damaging your new hair. It‚Äôs a very difficult technique and not every hair stylist can successfully complete it. She is a very skillful master and works for a low percent. I‚Äôm very happy and recommend her to you, you won‚Äôt regret!!!!

originalText.text: Tanya is absolutely fabulous! She does the best highlights and cut! Her positive attitude is  so welcoming! I booked her without knowing her and it‚Äôs been the best move! She listens, takes her time, and her color is so on point! I recommend her 100%!!

originalText.text: I wanted to share my experience with a Roman K Salon. First of all, the salon is very spacious and comfortable. I was offered a coffee by a very friendly administrator. However, the most of gratitude I want to devote to my hairstylist Masha Ianiuk üòç She is so adorable and caring, she gave me really helpful advice regarding colouring and home hair care. I am very pleased with the result and my hair finally becomes better after years of struggling. I am so happy and highly recommend!!!
